DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.PlotTypes package¶

Submodules¶

DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.PlotTypes.plt_Hist module¶

class DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.PlotTypes.plt_Hist.Hist(bins, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.plt_Base.Base

bins is specific for Hist. args and kwargs are defined in the __init__ of plt_Base

Parameters:
  • bins (int) – number of ‘steps’
  • args – standard conf
  • kwargs – standard conf
plot(ax, data)[source]¶

DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.PlotTypes.plt_LinLin module¶

class DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.PlotTypes.plt_LinLin.LinLin(plots, title=' ', x_label='time', y_label='Y-Axis', legend='upper left', grid=True, plot_type='LinLin', regression='')[source]¶

Bases: DataAnalyzer.PlotConfig.TwoD.plt_TwoD.TwoD

The basic subplot config gets stored here.

Parameters:
  • plots (list) – Name of the plots that are in the subplot
  • title (str) – subplot title
  • x_label (str) – x_label
  • y_label (str) – y_label
  • legend (str) – legend location (upper left, lower right, …)
  • grid (bool) – toggle grid
  • plot_type (str) – name of class Plot() should be inherited from (it is sufficient to write the name without plt_)
  • regression (str) – optionally add regression type
plot_specific(ax)[source]¶
